name: itm-group-style-guide
description: ITM Group Brand Style Guide - Interactive SPA

scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run check-format
scripts.build: npm run validate && npm run copy-files
scripts.copy-files: mkdir -p dist && cp -r index.html manifest.json sw.js src dist/ && cp -r .gitignore dist/
scripts.deploy:github: npm run build && echo 'Ready for GitHub Pages deployment'
